name: obs-copilot
_comment: Pinning type-fest to 3.11.x to satisfy obs-websocket-js@5.0.6 (^3.11.0) while avoiding conflicts observed with newer 3.x releases.

scripts.backend:setup: node -e "const {execSync, spawn}=require('child_process'); const fs=require('fs'); const isWin=process.platform==='win32'; const py = isWin ? 'backend/venv/Scripts/python.exe' : 'backend/venv/bin/python'; if(!fs.existsSync('backend/venv')){ try{ execSync('python3 -m venv backend/venv', {stdio:'inherit'}); }catch(e){ try{ execSync('python -m venv backend/venv', {stdio:'inherit'}); }catch(e2){ console.error('Failed to create venv'); process.exit(1);} } } try{ execSync(`${py} -m pip install -r backend/requirements.txt`, {stdio:'inherit'}); }catch(e){} const port = process.env.BACKEND_PORT || process.env.PORT || '8000'; const host = process.env.BACKEND_HOST || '0.0.0.0'; const child = spawn(py, ['-m','uvicorn','backend.main:app','--reload','--port',port,'--host',host], {stdio:'inherit'}); child.on('exit', code=>process.exit(code));"
